attributes.action: bring back national service for young offenders in an attempt to reduce the rise of violence on our streets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a country gripped in fear for our youngsters, I feel it necessary to start making a stand against those that spoil our countries good name. Re-introduce the national service to instill respect for others and themselves. We will no longer tolerate juveniles getting away with atrocious crimes and weak sentences.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
